column5: I got out yesterday for a few hours and decided to try for some pike. I bought myself a GoPro camera boxing week, so I figured it would be a goo opportunity to test it out! Here's a video of one of my catches. I ended up with 3 pike, all around the same size. Enjoy, and hope to have some awesome fishing videos this season! Diltsy
That was very well done man.  Nice little gator too
Nice vid. a nice technique I've seen is when the angler straps the go pro to their chest or to the butt of the rod, nice fish too!
That's awesome. What camera did you use and editing software?

^ GoPro camera  Nice video, I really enjoyed that. You captured the peace and calmness that fishing is for a lot of us I'm sure, gotta love it  Do you have more than 1 GoPro or did you have to "re-shoot" for some of those shots at other angles? If that makes sense
Great vid.  Some cool shots and a nice job editing.  GoPro's are awesome.
Oh noice one brotha!!  How many of dem go-pros you got?!?!  cheers HD
Video was great! Those gopros are wicked!  I'm excited to see some more videos you make in the future!
Great footage, ,icely put together!  Well done!  Congrats on your first open water fish of 2012!
Thanks everyone. I'm loving the camera and can't wait to make some more videos! I used a gopro HD hero camera and adobe premiere for editing. Keep a look out for more videos!
I look forward to your next video. Well done!
